title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. XIV, pt. 362 - The Healthy New York Program And The Direct Payment Stop Loss Relief Program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. XIV, pt. 362 - The Healthy New York Program And The Direct Payment Stop Loss Relief Program

State Regulations

Subpart 362-1 - Preamble (§ 362-1.1)

Subpart 362-2 - Rules Generally Applicable To The Healthy New York Program (§ 362-2.1 to 362-2.9)

Subpart 362-3 - Rules Relating To Small Employer Participation (other Than Individual Proprietors) (§ 362-3.1 to 362-3.2)

Subpart 362-4 - Rules Relating To Working Uninsured Individuals And Individual Proprietor Participation (§ 362-4.1 to 362-4.3)

Subpart 362-5 - Rules Relating To The Direct Payment Market Stop Loss Relief Program And State Funded Stop Loss Relief For The Healthy New York Program (§ 362-5.1 to 362-5.5)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. XIV, pt. 362

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§ 201, 301, 1109, 3201, 3216, 3217, 3221, 4235, 4303, 4304, 4305, 4318, 4321, 4321-a, 4322, 4322-a, 4326, 4327; FinancialServices Law, §§ 202, 301, 302

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
